description.description_one: Hello, i'm Felipe Frantz Zanini. Software engineer and passionate about jiu-jitsu, indie game development, Dota 2, writing, art, and music. I am 31 years old and live in Pelotas, Rio Grande do Sul, Brazil.
description.description_two: Mine journey in software development began in 2008 during technical school. In 2010, after completing the course, I started my first programming internship and have never stopped studying and evolving since. Upon becoming a full-time software engineer, I participated in over 40 projects, using many technologies, with an emphasis on PHP.
description.description_three: Passionate about the field and always seeking improvement, I obtained a Degree in Technology Management IT and a Specialization in IT Strategic Planning. I also started a Master's in Computer Science.
description.description_four: I currently hold the position of Senior Software Engineer and Tech Lead specializing in web development at nav9. I have the privilege of being a technology partner for companies such as Shoppings Iguatemi, UFC, EducaCross, Grupo SEB, Rede AZ, among others, helping to create the best web product solutions.
description.description_five: My goal is to create a completely independent game and document the entire process on my YouTube channel. To bring these game development and content projects to life, I have been investing time and energy in specializing in many areas, including scriptwriting, game design, level design, pixel art, color theory, as well as studying piano and music theory.

strong.title: Most confident with:
strong.description: Frameworks and libs JavaScript and/or Typescript based, especially React and Vue, Vite and SSRs (Nuxt e Next). CSS and some frameworks like Tailwind, MUI, Bootstrap and Bulma. Design Systems, Style-Directory and Storybook. Good practices, clean code, web performance and accessibility.

medium.title: I have good knowledge on:
medium.description: Angular, React-Native and Redux. Unit tests, backend with Node, Express, PHP, Laravel, CodeIgniter and database manipulation (MySQL e MongoDB).

weak.title: Able to provide support:
weak.description: GDScript, Python, Ruby, Rails, Firebase and native technologies.

graduations.title: Uni. da Região da Campanha - URCAMP
Uni. da Região da Campanha - URCAMP

about_section.about_description_one: This website was developed using Next.js as a framework, deployed with Vercel, styled using Tailwind, and with icons powered by the library React Icons. All text is set in the MavenPro typeface. Additionally, it serves as a showcase for my
about_section.about_description_two: , future projects, and primarily, my testing laboratory, where I experiment with various libraries and tools.

about_contact.contact_description_one: If you'd like to chat about building product, consulting or game development do get in touch at
